alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:17AM CST until January 26 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 930 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River at Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Minor flooding of Beaver Park and Vermilionville near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 11.0 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 5.9 Tue 3 am CST 6.8 10.5 9.8 &&
